oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sonja Henie receives key to City of Nashville, Tennessee, 1954 April
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Celebrity figure skater and film actress Sonja Henie, with unidentified men at a hotel desk, during her visit to Nashville, circa April 1954. Henie was presented a key to the City and also Honorary Citizenship of the City of Nashville. Henie was a Norwegian figure skater and film star who won more Olympic and World titles than any other ladies figure skater (Olympic Champion: 1928, 1932, 1936; World Champion 1927-1936, and European Champion 1931-1936. Henie became a very successful Hollywood movie star after signing a long term contract at Twentieth Century Fox circa 1936. She became one of the wealthiest women in the world in her time through her film career, figure skating and ice shows, and lucrative endorsement contracts. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Henie, Sonja, 1912-1969
